response.overview: Gary is a professional hitman who, after making a fatal mistake on assignment, is forced to confront his own moral convinctions. The story focuses on his inner journey, narrated by himself: from a cold executioner, to a man reconsidering his actions, exploring guilt, responsibility, and redemption.  Directed by: Teddy Pryor (2020) Cast: Kris Salvi (Gary/The reaper), Justin Thibault (Jackson), Simone Claire (Wendy/Wife), Justin Bonitz (Matt), Christie Devine (Janice), Chris Fisher (Husband), John Guilbert (Spike), Nancy O'Keefe (Gary's mother), Jay Sooly (Cain), Mike King (tortured man), Andy Krawczynski (reaper victim1), Cody Iwanicki (reaper victim2), Vinny Tevnan (lonely diner boy), Monica Ledoux (Cinnimon the escort), David Lavallee JR./Douglas Graves/Gabriel Bryant/Blais Guzman/David Martelli/Ross Claffey (thugs)
response.title: The Reaper
